name: Journey to the Summit
description:
This game is part of a Bachelor Thesis regarding the use of non-verbal player guidance to motivate players. This project was developed over the course of 12 weeks is the culmination of the skills acquired in my studies.

Game Description:

Journey to the summit is a 3D adventure game that allows the player to explore a big world. The game only has one simple goal: Climb the mountain. 

Although when and where you begin the climb is up to themselves. Player can explore four main areas which have all different ways to ascent the mountain with ranging difficulties. 

Key Features:

  • Exploring a interesting world and it's different regions!
  • Jump around & higher to find upgrades that help you conquer the mountain.
  • Talk to the inhabitans to learn more about the world.
  • Test your skills on four different ascents.
  • Leave the region if you don't want to climb the mountain.

How to play:

  • Mouse & Keyboard
  • Controller (PS & Xbox tested)

Credits:

This game was made by Dennis "Densch" Schaffner


This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Europe for Applied Sciences.

Supervised: Lena Falkenhagen & Jessica Kathmann
"Bachelor Project" - Winter 2022/2023
